pageContext.claim: “For many years America has issued most of its green cards to lower skilled immigrants and people that had no hope of getting a job, undermining blue collar workers and wages and costing taxpayers billions and billions of dollars a year.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump exaggerates the impact of immigration on U.S. workers’ wages by saying that the immigration of low-skilled workers has created substantial pressures on American workers, taxpayers and resources. Over time, immigrants are a net positive to the U.S. economy.
